addToHomeScreenPopup.title: Quick Tip üò∏

mobile.heading: üì±Add to Home Screen:
mobile.body: Tap and start the game with a single tap, just like an app.

desktop.heading: ‚≠êBookmark This Page:
desktop.body: Get quick access and jump into the game instantly.

addToHomeScreenPopup.note: *Your data is saved locally in your browser.

iphone.title: For iPhone (using Safari)
iphone.step1: 1. Tap the Share button at the bottom of the screen.
iphone.step3: 3. Tap Add in the top right corner.

android.title: For Android (using Chrome)
android.step1: 1. Tap the menu icon in the top right corner.
android.step2: 2. Select Add to Home Screen or Install app.
android.step3: 3. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the process.

basics.title: Basics
basics.description: East round only, no South round.

scoring.title: Scoring
scoring.description: No bonus points. Mangan-less hands score 0, but winning is possible.

calls.title: Calls
calls.description: No Chii. Kuikae, Atozuke, and Open Tanyao are all allowed.

riichi.title: Riichi
riichi.description: Kan (closed) is allowed after Riichi, even if it changes the waits.

priority.title: Winning Priority
priority.description: In case of multiple winners on the same discard, the player closest to the discarder wins (atama-hane).

points.title: Points
points.description: No points below zero (the game ends if a player's score drops below 0).

endCondition.title: End Condition
endCondition.description: Agari-yame is enabled. The game ends in the last round if the dealer wins or is in tenpai.
